SELECT -- 普通用户（含NULL当regular） (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE status = 1 AND (user_type = 'regular' OR user_type IS NULL)) AS regular, -- 代理商数量直接来自 agents 表 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM agents WHERE status = 1) AS agent, -- VIP 用户 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE status = 1 AND user_type = 'vip') AS vip
